ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] re: Class Balance
ygData.msgSnippet: ... [snip] Back in my early 20 s I met a cleric in Mistmoore who told the group he planned to specialize in evocation and had chosen a cleric because Wizards
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, Mar 16/00, Chris Musson <CMusson@...> wrote:

> Example of agressively stupid:
[snip]

Back in my early 20's I met a cleric in Mistmoore who told the group he
planned to specialize in evocation and had chosen a cleric because
Wizards couldn't wear enough armor. I think he made it to the mid 30's
before his reputation as the cleric who didn't heal kept him from
getting groups anywhere.

At least for the first few months of a server's life, it's a very small
world.

He probably restarted as a druid.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
